message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of modifying textual information in images using neural networks. This falls under the domain of computer vision (cs.CV) as well as artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed method involves the use of neural networks for font adaptation and color transfer, which falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper deals with text editing in images, which falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (cs.CL).
